detectors.description: Staker.reduce_time() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1c2ba713368ee581fab9bc73668b80fef703cdf9-Staker.sol#181-196) uses a weak PRNG: timePooled[msg.sender] (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1c2ba713368ee581fab9bc73668b80fef703cdf9-Staker.sol#195)

Staker.randomHour() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1c2ba713368ee581fab9bc73668b80fef703cdf9-Staker.sol#173-178) uses a weak PRNG: randomnumber (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1c2ba713368ee581fab9bc73668b80fef703cdf9-Staker.sol#177)

Staker.reduce_time() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1c2ba713368ee581fab9bc73668b80fef703cdf9-Staker.sol#181-196) uses a weak PRNG: new_time[msg.sender] > timePooled[msg.sender] (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1c2ba713368ee581fab9bc73668b80fef703cdf9-Staker.sol#190)

Staker.randomHour() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1c2ba713368ee581fab9bc73668b80fef703cdf9-Staker.sol#173-178) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: randomnumber = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(now,msg.sender,nonce))) % 86100 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x1c2ba713368ee581fab9bc73668b80fef703cdf9-Staker.sol#174)
